page.title: 10Droitwich_Recreation
page.content: Droitwich has many facilities for recreation and provides some entertainment at the amateur theatre,concert club and Working Men's clubs. Sporting facilities have increased with the opening in 1985 of a sports complex on the King George V playing fields in Ombersley Road. There are many other indoor,outdoor and water sports clubs in and around Droitwich.The swimming baths and new brine baths also provide recreational as well as club facilities. There are a number of youth groups and clubs and many less active clubs for example:Citizen Band radio,flower arranging,chess,photography,dancing,co mputers,etc. Droitwich also has a good public library and public parks.
